 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָלַל‎</span>] **verb** ==sink, be submerged== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒalâlu***</u></abbr>, ***sink down, sink to rest***, II. ***launch*** ([[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>Prol. Assyr. Gr. 1iii; BAS i. Ball, Gen. 53</sup>); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***float***, compare [[BDB#Nes|Nes]]<sup>Mar. x:</sup> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צְלַל‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, are ***filter, clarify***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽלְלוּ כַּעוֺפֶרֶת בְּמַיִם‎</span> [[Exod.15.10|Exod 15:10]].
